Source_Event_IDs.description: All original event IDs from various sources (e.g., Disaster Charter Activation ID). If only one source provides an ID, this array will have a single string.

Event_Name.description: An array of event names (e.g., 'Disaster') from different sources. If sources differ, all unique names are retained.

Event_Type.description: An array of event types (e.g., 'Flood', 'Earthquake'). If sources differ, all unique variations are retained.

Country.description: An array of country names (mapped from 'Location of Event'). If multiple sources differ, all unique names are retained.

Location.description: List of sub-national locations or administrative areas (mapped from 'Location of Event'). If multiple sources differ, all are included.

Date.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time (mapped from 'Date of Activation'). If sources differ, you may store one or eventually keep multiple values.

Year.description: Year extracted from the event date (mapped from 'Year'). If multiple years differ, you may store one or convert to an array if needed.

Month.description: Month extracted from the event date (mapped from 'Month'). Similar considerations as Year.

Time.description: Time portion of the activation (mapped from 'Time of Activation'). If multiple times differ, could be stored as an array if needed.

External_Links.description: URLs or references to external resources (mapped from 'Details Link'). If multiple sources differ, all are included.
